import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { UserService } from '../user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register-student', templateUrl: './register-student.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register-student.component.css'] }) export class RegisterStudentComponent { constructor(private userService:UserService){} username:string = "" password:string = "" safeQuestion: string= "" safeResponse:string = "" name:string = "" lastName:string = "" gender:string = "" adr:string = "" phone:string = "" email:string = "" schoolType:string = "" grade:number = 0 photo:File|null = null message:string = "" onFileSelected(event: any) { this.photo = event.target.files[0] as File; } registerUser(){ // lozinka const regex = /^(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*[a-z]{3,})(?=.*\d)(?=.*[@$!%*?&])[A-Za-z]\w{5,9}$/; if(!regex.test(this.password)){ this.message = "Lozinka nije u dobrom formatu!" return } } }
